parameters.name: AlertLevel
parameters.description:
The severity of alerts. Valid values:

*   0: does not generate alerts
*   1: sends notifications
*   2: suspicious
*   3: high-risk

parameters.name: FileOps
parameters.description: The operations performed on the files.

parameters.name: FilePaths
parameters.description: The paths to the monitored files. Wildcard characters are supported.

parameters.name: ProcPaths
parameters.description: The paths to the monitored processes.

parameters.name: RuleAction
parameters.description:
The handling method of the rule. Valid values:

*   pass: allow
*   alert

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the rule. Valid values:

*   **0**: disabled
*   **1**: enabled
